meta.name: My14er Design System
meta.purpose: A comprehensive, AI-oriented design guide describing the visual system the My14er site implements. Source of truth is the live implementation in app/globals.css and app/layout.tsx.

appliesTo.styling: Tailwind CSS v4 + global CSS variables in app/globals.css

tokens.name: CSS Variables
tokens.notes: All design tokens are defined as CSS custom properties using Tailwind v4's @theme inline syntax.

tokens.name: Font Configuration
tokens.notes: Fonts loaded via next/font/google and exposed as CSS variables (--font-sans, --font-display).

componentImplementations.name: Landing page
componentImplementations.notes: Defines hero/feature cards/peaks table/trip reports/CTA band/footer styling.

componentImplementations.name: Community feed
componentImplementations.notes: Defines app shell header, feed cards, composer, right rail widgets.

componentImplementations.name: Peak bagger profile
componentImplementations.notes: Defines profile header, stats bar, checklist, timeline, pinned reports.

designNotes.rule: Use `brand.primary` (#064E3B) for primary CTAs, `brand.accent` (#065F46) for hover states, and reserve `brand.highlight` (#11D432) for success/verified badges only.

highLevelGuidelines.productFeel: Modern alpine/outdoors, confident, high-contrast, and slightly premium. Clean surfaces with soft shadows, strong forest-green CTAs, and tasteful imagery/gradients.
principles: High-contrast hierarchy: big headings, strong weights, tight tracking, short copy.
Soft surfaces: rounded-xl/2xl/3xl cards with subtle borders and shadows.
Forest-green branding: primary actions and key UI affordances are green; everything else is slate/neutral.
Subtle motion: hover lift, scale, and shadow increase; no busy animations.
Dark mode-ready: provide paired light/dark surfaces and borders.
do: Use `rounded-xl` cards as the default surface; use `rounded-2xl` for feature cards; `rounded-3xl` for big CTA bands.
Use thin borders: mint/green-tinted in the app UIs and slate-tinted in marketing sections.
Use `font-bold`/`font-extrabold` for headings and CTAs; use tight tracking on brand headings.
Use sticky, blurred headers for app pages (feed).
Use image covers with subtle black gradients for readability.
dont: Don’t mix multiple primary greens in one view. Keep one `brand.primary` and reserve neon green for status highlights.
Don’t use sharp corners or heavy borders.
Don't introduce new typography families; keep DM Sans for body/UI and Playfair Display for headlines.
Don’t overuse gradients; keep them for hero imagery and a small number of highlight cards.

tailwind.utilityFirstRule: Prefer Tailwind utilities for layout/spacing/typography; map all colors/radii/shadows to CSS variables; avoid ad-hoc hex colors.

primary.name: DM Sans
primary.usage: Body text, UI elements, labels, navigation

display.name: Playfair Display
display.usage: Hero headlines, section titles, editorial emphasis. Use italic for accent.

fonts.mono: Use default system mono only where needed
typographyRules: Use DM Sans for all body text and UI.
Use Playfair Display for large headlines and section titles (apply via fontFamily: 'var(--font-display)').
Use tight tracking on display headings for editorial feel.
Use bold/semibold weights for CTAs and navigation.

container.notes: Marketing sections use max-w-7xl; app pages in the mocks use max-w-[1280px] and larger side paddings at lg.

background.notes: App pages use a slightly warm light background; marketing can use cooler slate (#F8FAFC).

usedInMocks: App header nav links: hidden on mobile, visible at md+ (md:flex).
Feed layout: 1 column on mobile, 12-col grid on lg with sticky side rails.
Landing hero: typography scales at md (5xl -> 7xl).
Profile header: stacks on mobile, splits on md.

primary.notes: Landing mock primary and forest-green brand.

accent.notes: Hover/secondary brand green used for CTA hover.

light.notes: Minty light surface used for inputs/buttons in app pages.

secondary.notes: Slate-blue used heavily in marketing copy.

stoneWarm.notes: Warm beige for borders and backgrounds.

stoneLight.notes: Light warm surface for CTA bands.

amberGlow.notes: Warm amber for editorial accents, underlines, hover highlights.

heroImageOverlay.usage: Landing hero image overlay for readability.

marketingSidebarCard.usage: Community feed right-rail 'Live Map View' card.

heroH1.tailwind: text-5xl sm:text-6xl lg:text-7xl xl:text-8xl font-bold tracking-tight leading-[0.9]
usage: Landing hero headline - use Playfair Display, italic for accent words

colorRules: On light surfaces, primary text is #0D1B10; marketing copy often uses slate #334155.
Text on brand/dark/imagery should use white with appropriate opacity (e.g. white/90, white/70).

radii.rule: Default cards are `rounded-xl`. Feature cards and big CTAs often use `rounded-2xl`/`rounded-3xl`. Pills/badges use `rounded-full`.

default.rule: Use 1px borders as subtle separators; mint-tinted borders in app pages and slate-tinted borders in marketing.

elevation.rule: Default surfaces are subtle (`shadow-sm`). Interactive marketing cards lift and deepen shadow noticeably.

motion.rule: Use subtle hover interactions: shadow increase, small lift, occasional slight scale on primary CTA.

animations.description: Custom CSS animations defined in globals.css for editorial page transitions.

keyframes.name: fade-up
keyframes.description: Fade in while translating up 30px. Use for staggered hero content.

animations.usage: Apply animate-fade-up with staggered delays (delay-100, delay-200, etc.) to hero elements for editorial entrance.

decorativePatterns.description: CSS classes for textural overlays and decorative elements.

classes.name: topo-pattern
classes.description: Subtle topographic line pattern overlay using SVG background. Use on section backgrounds.

classes.name: grain-overlay
classes.description: Noise texture overlay via ::before pseudo-element. Apply to dark sections for film grain effect.

classes.name: mountain-divider
classes.description: Zigzag mountain silhouette divider using gradients.

classes.name: editorial-underline
classes.description: Animated underline that scales in on hover. Use for editorial text links.

classes.name: card-hover
classes.description: Premium card hover with lift, rotation, and green-tinted shadow.

ButtonPrimary.description: Rounded button used for primary calls to action (solid forest green with slide-up hover).

base.tailwind: group relative bg-[var(--color-brand-primary)] text-white font-semibold overflow-hidden transition-all hover:shadow-2xl hover:shadow-[var(--color-brand-primary)]/30
base.hoverEffect: Nested div with bg-[var(--color-brand-accent)] translate-y-full group-hover:translate-y-0 transition-transform duration-300

outline.tailwind: px-8 py-4 rounded-2xl font-semibold text-base text-[var(--color-text-secondary)] border-2 border-[var(--color-border-app-strong)] bg-white/50 backdrop-blur-sm hover:bg-white hover:border-[var(--color-brand-primary)]/20 transition-all

stoneOutline.tailwind: px-10 py-5 rounded-2xl font-semibold text-lg text-[var(--color-text-secondary)] border-2 border-[var(--color-stone-warm)] hover:border-[var(--color-brand-primary)]/20 hover:bg-white/50 transition-all

soft.tailwind: bg-[var(--color-surface-subtle)] text-[var(--color-brand-primary)] font-semibold text-sm rounded-lg px-4 py-2 hover:bg-[color-mix(in_srgb,var(--color-surface-subtle),#000_6%)] transition-all

AppHeaderSticky.description: Floating pill-shaped header with blurred background. Fixed at top with margin for floating effect.

inner.tailwind: mx-4 mt-4 md:mx-8 md:mt-6 max-w-7xl mx-auto bg-white/90 backdrop-blur-xl rounded-full px-6 py-3 shadow-lg border border-[var(--color-border-app)] flex items-center justify-between

logo.icon: w-10 h-10 bg-[var(--color-brand-primary)] rounded-xl flex items-center justify-center transition-transform group-hover:rotate-6

navLink.tailwind: px-4 py-2 text-sm font-medium text-[var(--color-text-secondary)] hover:text-[var(--color-brand-primary)] rounded-full hover:bg-[var(--color-surface-subtle)] transition-all

search.tailwind: hidden sm:flex items-center min-w-40 h-10 max-w-64 w-full
search.inputShell: flex w-full items-stretch rounded-lg bg-[var(--color-surface-subtle)] dark:bg-white/5 overflow-hidden
search.input: w-full border-none bg-transparent focus:ring-0 px-4 pl-2 text-sm placeholder:opacity-70

CardSurface.description: Default surface used across app pages and marketing cards (rounded, bordered, softly elevated).

container.tailwindApp: bg-white dark:bg-white/5 rounded-xl shadow-sm border border-[var(--color-border-app)] dark:border-white/10
container.tailwindMarketing: bg-white dark:bg-slate-900/50 rounded-2xl shadow-sm border border-[var(--color-border-marketing)] dark:border-white/10

structure: Fixed pill-shaped header with blur + border (floating style)
Hero with full-bleed image, gradient overlays, large Playfair H1, subhead, dual CTAs, stats card
Peaks table section with topo-pattern background
Trip reports section (dark green bg with grain overlay)
Feature cards grid (3 cards) with card-hover effect
Large CTA band (stone-light bg, rounded-[2.5rem]) with mountain silhouette
Footer with nav columns and social links
layoutRules: Use max-w-7xl and `px-4 sm:px-8` for marketing layout.
Hero is min-h-[100vh] with responsive typography scaling.
Feature cards use `rounded-3xl`, white bg, and card-hover class.
Use animate-fade-up with staggered delays for hero content entrance.

structure: 12-col layout on lg: left profile/achievements rail (sticky), feed column (composer + posts), right widgets rail (sticky)
Feed post cards: header row + image + content + action bar
layoutRules: App pages use max-w-[1280px] and larger side padding at lg (`lg:px-40`).
Use sticky side rails with top offsets (top-24).

structure: Hero image header (cover) with black-to-transparent gradient overlay
Profile header card (rounded-xl, mint border) with avatar, verified badge, primary follow button
Stats bar (3 cards) with progress bar and minty surfaces
Main grid: checklist (left) and timeline + pinned reports (right)
layoutRules: Use `max-w-6xl` container for profile content; overlap header card on hero via negative margin.
Borders are green-tinted (#CFE7D3) and dark-mode variants (#2D4A32).
Neon green is reserved for verified/pro highlights and progress fills.

contrast: Primary text (#0D1B10) on light surfaces has high contrast; ensure slate copy remains readable on #F8FAFC/#F6F8F6.
Brand buttons use white text on deep green (#064E3B). Keep text at least `text-sm font-bold`.
focus: Add focus rings to all interactive elements: `focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-[var(--color-brand-primary)] focus-visible:ring-offset-2`.
touchTargets: Buttons should be at least 40px tall (the mocks commonly use `h-10` for header/app controls).
motion: Use hover motion sparingly; prefer `transition-all` with short durations (200–300ms). Respect reduced motion settings if adding animations beyond hover.

whenAddingNewUI: Use DM Sans for body/UI and Playfair Display for display headlines (apply via fontFamily: 'var(--font-display)').
Use semantic tokens: `brand.primary` (#064E3B), `brand.accent` (#065F46), reserve `brand.highlight` (#11D432) for success/verified only.
Default card: `rounded-3xl bg-white border border-[var(--color-border-app)]` with card-hover class for interactive cards.
Primary buttons: `rounded-full` or `rounded-2xl` + `font-semibold` + subtle shadow; add hover slide-up effect with accent color.
Use warm stone palette (`stone-light`, `stone-warm`, `amber-glow`) for CTA sections and editorial accents.
Apply animate-fade-up with staggered delays (delay-100, delay-200, etc.) for entrance animations.
Use topo-pattern class for subtle topographic texture on light sections; grain-overlay for dark sections.
avoid: Avoid inventing new greens; do not treat neon green as a primary CTA color.
Avoid introducing additional font families beyond DM Sans and Playfair Display.
Avoid sharp corners; prefer rounded-xl, rounded-2xl, rounded-3xl, or rounded-full.
Avoid heavy outlines; keep borders subtle and shadow-driven elevation.

preferredColorUsage.backgrounds: Use `page` (#F6F8F6) for app pages; white surfaces for cards; `brand.primary` for dark sections; `stone-light` for warm CTA bands.
preferredColorUsage.text: Use `text.primary` (#0D1B10) and `text.secondary` (#334155); use white for text on imagery/brand; `amber-glow` for editorial accents.
preferredColorUsage.borders: Use `border.app` (#E7F3E9) and `border.appStrong` (#CFE7D3) in app pages; use `border.marketing` (#E2E8F0) in marketing.
preferredColorUsage.primaryCta: brand.primary (#064E3B) with hover brand.accent (#065F46); use rounded-2xl with slide-up hover animation.
